com.konakart.app
Class EmailOptions

java.lang.Object
  com.konakart.app.EmailOptions
All Implemented Interfaces:
EmailOptionsIf
public class EmailOptions
extends java.lang.Object
implements EmailOptionsIf

An object used to configure options used when sending eMails.

getCountryCode

public java.lang.String getCountryCode()
Description copied from interface: EmailOptionsIf
The two letter country code used to determine the correct template to use. The naming convention for templates is templateName_countryCode.vm. e.g. EmailNewPassword_en.vm

Specified by:
getCountryCode in interface EmailOptionsIf
Returns:
Returns the countryCode.

getContentType

public int getContentType()
Description copied from interface: EmailOptionsIf
Get the Email Content Type. Options are:
  • KKConstants.NOT_SET (-1 the default)
  • KKConstants.EMAIL_AS_HTML (1)
  • KKConstants.EMAIL_AS_PLAIN_TEXT (2)

Specified by:
getContentType in interface EmailOptionsIf
Returns:
the contentType

setContentType

public void setContentType(int contentType)
Description copied from interface: EmailOptionsIf
Set the Email Content Type. Options are:
  • KKConstants.NOT_SET (-1 the default)
  • KKConstants.EMAIL_AS_HTML (1)
  • KKConstants.EMAIL_AS_PLAIN_TEXT (2)

Specified by:
setContentType in interface EmailOptionsIf
Parameters:
contentType - the contentType to set

getCustomAttrs

public NameValueIf[] getCustomAttrs()
Description copied from interface: EmailOptionsIf
An array of name value pairs used to pass custom information to the Velocity engine. The value can be retrieved from the template using the name preceded by the $ sign. e.g. If a name value pair contains StoreId and 22, the value 22 will be displayed in the eMail where the template contains $StoreId.

Specified by:
getCustomAttrs in interface EmailOptionsIf
Returns:
Returns the customAttrs.

setCustomAttrs

public void setCustomAttrs(NameValueIf[] customAttrs)
Description copied from interface: EmailOptionsIf
An array of name value pairs used to pass custom information to the Velocity engine. The value can be retrieved from the template using the name preceded by the $ sign. e.g. If a name value pair contains StoreId and 22, the value 22 will be displayed in the eMail where the template contains $StoreId.

Specified by:
setCustomAttrs in interface EmailOptionsIf
Parameters:
customAttrs - The customAttrs to set.

isCreateInvoice

public boolean isCreateInvoice()
Description copied from interface: EmailOptionsIf
Set to true to create the invoice (if it isn't already present) to attach to the email. The invoice created will be deleted after attaching to the email.

Specified by:
isCreateInvoice in interface EmailOptionsIf
Returns:
the createInvoice

Parameters:

getFullAttachmentFilename

public java.lang.String getFullAttachmentFilename()
Description copied from interface: EmailOptionsIf
The complete filename of an attachment. The following API calls support user defined attachments:
  • sendTemplateEmailToCustomer1()
  • sendWelcomeEmail1()
  • sendNewPassword1()

Specified by:

Returns:
the fullAttachmentFilename

getFriendlyAttachmentName

public java.lang.String getFriendlyAttachmentName()
Description copied from interface: EmailOptionsIf
The friendly filename of an attachment that can be viewed from the eMail. The following API calls support user defined attachments:
  • sendTemplateEmailToCustomer1()
  • sendWelcomeEmail1()
  • sendNewPassword1()

Specified by:

isDeleteAttachmentAfterSend

public boolean isDeleteAttachmentAfterSend()
Description copied from interface: EmailOptionsIf
When set to true, the attachment is deleted after being sent. The default value is false.

getBccEmails

public java.lang.String getBccEmails()
Description copied from interface: EmailOptionsIf
Semicolon separated list of blind copy email addresses. When set, these will be used rather than the ones that may be present in a configuration variable.

Specified by:
getBccEmails in interface EmailOptionsIf
Returns:
the bccEmails

Parameters:
